audioTask.title: Audio Task
audioTask.desc: We are committed to generating the most natural station announcements. To achieve this, we conducted deep training based on a large number of samples. Experience the highest quality announcements powered by the latest large-scale machine learning models!
audioTask.note1: Please note that currently only Shanghai-style station announcements are available.
audioTask.note2: Due to computational limitations, please be patient after submitting your request - we aim to process all requests within 7 days.
audioTask.note3: Please download and save your creations promptly, as we only guarantee data storage for 30 days.
audioTask.note4: For best English announcements, use clear station names in 'station name pinyin'. Chinese characters are optional.
audioTask.exampleEN: The terminal of this train is ËéòÂ∫Ñ University. Next station is ‰∫îËßíÂú∫ Railway Station. Doors will open on the right.
audioTask.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio playback. Chrome or Firefox is recommended.
audioTask.loginFirst: Please log in first to generate audio with AI.
audioTask.report1: If you encounter any issues with the generated announcements,
audioTask.report3: We will fully return your points after confirmation.
audioTask.freeInternet1: We believe in a free and open internet. You may also
audioTask.freeInternet3: and use in your preferred audio provider :)

new.title: New Task
new.content1: This will create a new task from the current project.
new.content2: The estimated points consumed will be
new.content3: The actual points used is subject to the server.
new.content4: You may cancel the task before processing to get a full points return.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Rail Map Announcer
welcome.desc: Here, you can create and generate customized line displays and announcements!
welcome.step1: Import your work from the Rail Map Generator (top-right)
welcome.step2: Adjust details like door opening direction
welcome.start: We've prepared a sample project‚Äîclose this window and start exploring! :)
